================

**Request for Standing Offer**

**Project Title**
---------------

Various Support Services for the Polar Continental Shelf Program, Resolute Bay, Nunavut

**Contract Reference**
----------------------

CB-6119-92945001

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

### Procurement Category

Service Category (SRV)

### Procurement Method

Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Contract Period

The proposed period of the Standing Offer will be from the date of award to March 31, 2024, with four one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

### Contract Description

This requirement is for Natural Resources Canada, and the procurement is subject to the Directive on Government Contracts, including Real Property Leases, in the Nunavut Settlement Area. The solicitation is limited to bids from firms registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR).

The requirement is for the provision of various support services, grouped into six streams, for the Polar Continental Shelf Program located in Resolute Bay, Nunavut:

1. Water Supply
2. Sewage Pick up and Disposal
3. Movement of Cargo (including Hazardous Waste and Dangerous Goods)
4. Heavy Equipment, Yard and Site Maintenance
5. Casual Labour/Services/Licensed Trade Person on an “as and when requested” basis
6. Incinerator Operator

Bidders may submit a proposal for all streams or any of the streams.

### Security Requirements

1. The Contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).
2. Contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive sites must each hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by the CSP, PWGSC.
3. Subcontracts containing security requirements are not to be awarded without prior written permission of the CSP, PWGSC.
4. The Contractor must comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Check List and security guide (if applicable) and the Contract Security Manual (Latest Edition).
